    • Method Detail

      • dispatchGalleryIntent

        public void dispatchGalleryIntent()
        Starts an activity to select a photo from the device's memory

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile(int resultCode,
                            Intent data)
        This method returns the file of an image selected in the photo gallery. It should be called within the onActivityResult method of an Activity.
        Parameters:
        resultCode - Result code of a previous activity
        data - Data returned from a previous activity
        Returns:
        An image's file if successful, null otherwise

      • getBitmap

        public Bitmap getBitmap(int resultCode,
                        Intent data)
        This method returns a bitmap of an image selected in the photo gallery. It should be called within the onActivityResult method of an Activity.
        Parameters:
        resultCode - Result code of a previous activity
        data - Data returned from a previous activity
        Returns:
        A bitmap image if successfully completed, null otherwise
